about_the_game:
Welcome to Sudocity, where the ultimate city-building and sudoku experience awaits. Build your city, solve puzzles, and rule the urban jungle in this minimalist masterpiece.

In Sudocity, each sudoku number represents a color of building and it's up to you to decide its fate - will it be a residential paradise, a bustling commercial hub, or a factory powerhouse? As you solve puzzles, your city will grow and evolve, and you'll have to manage resources to keep it thriving. But be warned, happy citizens are key to a thriving metropolis and red-faced, "pissed off" citizens can spell disaster.



As the seasons change, a new train will arrive at the station carrying fresh citizens, it's up to you to take proper care of them and make sure they find the right place to call home. Will they work at a commercial building or a factory? This decision is on your hands.

But as your city expands, people will need to use vehicles to work in further buildings. So, manage the flow of traffic to keep it running smoothly. As your city grows and becomes more complex, it will become chaotic, with lots of people and cars trying to get to their destinations.



But don't worry, solving sudoku puzzles can improve working memory and help you manage the complexity of your city. Sudocity offers a unique and refreshing take on city-building and puzzle games. With its minimalist design, challenging gameplay, and endless possibilities, it's a game that will keep you engaged for hours. So, get ready to flex your brain power and build the ultimate city in Sudocity.
